import { Card, CardContent } from "../components/ui/card"; import { Button } from "../components/ui/button"; import { Separator } from "../components/ui/separator"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useTranslations } from '../LanguageContext'; export default function Learn() { const nav = useNavigate(); const { t } = useTranslations(); const useCases = [ { title: "Make a presentation with AI", prompt: "искам да направя презентация за продукта ни", cap: "cap:slide-generate" }, { title: "Research a topic quickly", prompt: "направи обзор на пазара за електрически велосипеди в ЕС", cap: "cap:research-web" }, { title: "Create social media campaign", prompt: "маркетингова кампания за Instagram за кафе-бар", cap: "cap:text-explain" }, ]; return (

Learn

How to get the most out of My AI: quick guides, use cases, and best practices.

How the platform works

1) Describe your goal. 2) We break it into macro-steps. 3) For each step we suggest the strongest AI tools.

AI Literacy & Safety

• Verify facts with multiple sources.

• Be mindful of bias; ask for critical evaluation.

• Don’t paste secrets; use anonymized data.

• Check licensing for generated media.

Use Cases & Guides

{useCases.map((u) => (

{u.title}

Prompt: “{u.prompt}”

 ))}
); }
